job_tasks.phrase: Daarnaast experimenteer je met generatieve AI om klantvragen sneller en gemakkelijker te beantwoorden en waardevolle inzichten te genereren.
job_tasks.justification: This sentence explicitly mentions experimenting with generative AI to answer customer questions, which is a core aspect of prompt engineering and using generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: Je implementeert en test nieuwe algoritmen die data-analyse versnellen en verbeteren, zodat onze klanten beter en sneller de juiste (strategische) beslissingen kunnen nemen.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met onze data-experts en softwareontwikkelaars om AI-oplossingen naadloos te integreren in onze systemen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of AI solutions into existing systems, which falls under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Tot slot presenteer je je bevindingen en aanbevelingen aan het team

profile.rationale: The role involves both developing AI models (1.B.1) and experimenting with generative AI for customer interaction (1.B.2), indicating a focus on GenAI specialization. It also includes integrating these AI solutions into systems (1.A.1) and collaborating with other teams (3.1). The tasks lean towards AI specialization (Macro-Category B) with significant software integration aspects (Macro-Category A), and the explicit mention of generative AI makes 'Core GenAI Engineer' the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI model development, generative AI experimentation, and integration. The language is specific enough to identify the core tasks. However, it's an internship/stage role, so the depth of experience expected might be less than a full-time position, leading to a slightly less definitive classification compared to a senior role. No specific technologies were mentioned, which would have increased confidence.
